title: Spiced Courgette CakeSpiced Courgette Cake
directions: Preheat oven to 180 C / Gas 4. Grease one 20x30cm baking tin.
Place grated courgette in a colander and set aside to drain.
Mix together the flour, bicarbonate of soda, baking powder, caster sugar, dark brown soft sugar, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg and salt in a large bowl until well blended. Set aside.
Beat the eggs, apple sauce, oil and vanilla in a separate bowl until smooth. Fold in the flour mixture, then stir in the courgette.
Pour batter into the prepared tin. Bake until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean, 45 to 55 minutes. Allow to cool completely before cutting.
